        public boolean login(@Nonnull
                     java.util.UUID uniqueId)

        Parameters:
        uniqueId - the id of the user that logged in
        Returns:
        false if the user needs to be kicked

      • hasLoggedIn

        public boolean hasLoggedIn(@Nonnull
                           java.util.UUID uniqueId)
        Checks if a user has logged in (if the data was loaded successfully)
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - the id of the user that should be checked
        Returns:
        true if everything is good, false if the data was not loaded
